languages.text: Until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} gains damage {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against ranged attacks equal to the number of stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} on the Vanguard. Additionally, the Vanguard becomes immune to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} and forced movement effects until their next turn.
languages.original_text: До начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангард{/g} получает {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} урона от атак дальнего боя, равное числу накопленных {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}знаков стойкости{/g}. Кроме того, авангарда нельзя {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}оттолкнуть{/g} и заставить переместиться с помощью эффекта до начала его следующего хода.

traits.locale_text: Until the start of their next turn, the Vanguard gains damage deflection against ranged attacks equal to the number of stacks of unyielding beacon on the Vanguard. Additionally, the Vanguard becomes immune to Push and forced movement effects until their next turn.

Until the start of their next turn, the Vanguard gains damage deflection against ranged attacks equal to the number of stacks of unyielding beacon on the Vanguard. Additionally, the Vanguard becomes immune to push and forced movement effects until their next turn.

Additionally, the Vanguard becomes immune to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} and forced movement effects until their next turn.

Кроме того, авангарда нельзя {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}оттолкнуть{/g} и заставить переместиться с помощью эффекта до начала его следующего хода.
languages.original_text: Until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} gains damage {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against ranged attacks equal to the number of stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} on the Vanguard. Additionally, the Vanguard becomes immune to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} and forced movement effects until their next turn.

traits.locale_text: До начала своего следующего хода авангард получает отражение урона от атак дальнего боя, равное числу накопленных знаков стойкости. Кроме того, авангарда нельзя оттолкнуть и заставить переместиться с помощью эффекта до начала его следующего хода.

До начала своего следующего хода авангард получает отражение урона от атак дальнего боя, равное числу накопленных знаков стойкости. Кроме того, авангарда нельзя оттолкнуть и заставить переместиться с помощью эффекта до начала его следующего хода.

languages.text: 在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始前，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}获得对{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，此加值等同于先锋身上{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不灭明光{/g}的层数。此外，先锋在下个回合开始前免疫一切{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推挤{/g}与强制位移效果。
languages.original_text: Until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} gains {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks equal to the number of stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} on the Vanguard. Additionally, the Vanguard becomes immune to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} and forced movement effects until their next turn.

traits.locale_text: 在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始前，先锋获得对{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击的伤害{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，此加值等同于先锋身上{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不灭明光{/g}的层数。此外，先锋在下个回合开始前免疫一切推挤与强制位移效果。

languages.text: Hasta el comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} gana tanto {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} contra ataques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} como el número de acumulaciones de {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Dechado de firmeza{/g} que tenga. Además, hasta su próximo turno el vanguardia se vuelve inmune al {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empujón{/g} y a los efectos que le obliguen a moverse.
languages.original_text: Until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} gains {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks equal to the number of stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} on the Vanguard. Additionally, the Vanguard becomes immune to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} and forced movement effects until their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el vanguardia gana tanto {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} de daño contra ataques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} como el número de acumulaciones de {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Dechado de firmeza{/g} que tenga. Además, hasta su próximo turno el vanguardia se vuelve inmune al empujón y a los efectos que le obliguen a moverse.

languages.text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g} erhält bis zum Beginn ihres nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Schadensdeflektion{/g} gegen Fernkampfangriffe, die der Stapelanzahl von {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit{/g} auf der Vorhut entsprechen. Darüber hinaus wird die Vorhut bis zu ihrem nächsten Zug immun gegen {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}Stöße{/g} und erzwungene Bewegungseffekte.
languages.original_text: Until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} gains damage {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against ranged attacks equal to the number of stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} on the Vanguard. Additionally, the Vanguard becomes immune to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} and forced movement effects until their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Die Vorhut erhält bis zum Beginn ihrer nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Schadensdeflektion{/g} gegen {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriffe{/g}, die der Stapelanzahl von {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit{/g} auf der Vorhut entsprechen. Darüber hinaus wird die Vorhut bis zu ihrer nächsten Runde immun gegen Stöße und erzwungene Bewegungseffekte.

languages.text: Jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant, le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Patrouilleur{/g} bénéficie contre les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} égale au nombre de cumuls de {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Guide Inflexible{/g} qu'il a acquis. En outre, le Patrouilleur est invulnérable aux effets des {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}poussées{/g} et des déplacements forcés jusqu'à son tour suivant.
languages.original_text: Until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} gains {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks equal to the number of stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} on the Vanguard. Additionally, the Vanguard becomes immune to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} and forced movement effects until their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant, le Patrouilleur bénéficie contre les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} des dégâts égale au nombre de cumuls de {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Guide Inflexible{/g} qu'il a acquis. En outre, le Patrouilleur est invulnérable aux effets des poussées et des déplacements forcés jusqu'à son tour suivant.

languages.text: 次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に対して、自身の{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不屈の標{/g}のスタック数に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}を得る。さらに、次のターンまで{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}ノックバック{/g}や強制移動効果を無効化する。
languages.original_text: Until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} gains {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks equal to the number of stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} on the Vanguard. Additionally, the Vanguard becomes immune to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} and forced movement effects until their next turn.

traits.locale_text: 次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで、ヴァンガードは{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}攻撃のダメージに対して、自身の{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不屈の標{/g}のスタック数に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}を得る。さらに、次のターンまで吹き飛ばしや強制移動効果を無効化する。
